references.paper_title: ReferIt3D: Neural listeners for fine-grained 3d object identification in real-world scenes
references.reason: This paper is foundational to the field of 3D referring expression segmentation and provides a benchmark dataset and task definition.

references.paper_title: ScanRefer: 3d object localization in rgb-d scans using natural language
references.reason: This paper introduces the ScanRefer dataset, a widely used benchmark for 3D referring expression tasks, which significantly advances the field.

references.paper_title: ScanNet: Richly-annotated 3d reconstructions of indoor scenes
references.reason: This paper provides the ScanNet dataset, a large-scale, richly annotated 3D scene dataset crucial for training and evaluating 3D vision models.

references.paper_title: Text-guided graph neural networks for referring 3d instance segmentation
references.reason: This paper is among the earliest works to tackle 3D referring expression segmentation, proposing a novel two-stage framework for this task.

references.paper_title: 3D-STMN: Dependency-driven superpoint-text matching network for end-to-end 3d referring expression segmentation
references.reason: This paper presents a strong baseline for end-to-end 3D referring expression segmentation that the current paper improves upon.
